{"locationId": "672", "organizationId": "566", "name": "Nourishing Hope-Sheridan Market", "address1": "3945 N Sheridan Rd", "address2": null, "city": "Chicago", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "60613", "country": "US", "phone": "773-525-1777", "phoneExt": null, "website": "https://www.nourishinghopechi.org", "latitude": "41.9540042", "longitude": "-87.6540906", "foodPrograms": "", "serviceAreas": "CITY: Chicago", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Nourishing Hope's Sheridan Market When you come to the Sheridan Market, you\u2019ll receive safely packed, pre-packaged groceries, making sure you get what you need and want. Our offerings include: Healthy dairy products, including milk and cheese; A wide variety of meats; High-quality fresh vegetables from our partners; Personal hygiene products; and flowers at the end of every visit. We can\u2019t wait for you to visit us! We understand that coming to a food pantry for the first time can sometimes be a difficult or confusing experience, but at Nourishing Hope, we do our best to make you feel welcome and comfortable. The option of food choice has returned to Sheridan Market. (Our pre-packaged \u201cExpress\u201d distribution will continue to be available if desired.) This process might take a little longer, but we are excited to welcome you inside if you choose. An additional produce distribution will continue to be pre-packaged. We believe you deserve to eat well and eat what you want. Come visit us and find the food you need. Monthly food pick-ups: Each family can expect 50-100lbs of food once a month. The food we distribute changes every day, but you will always find a selection of frozen meat, fresh produce, dairy, eggs, milk, bread, canned goods and dry goods. Amount of food received is based on family size and needs. Additional produce pick-ups: Come back every month for fresh bread and produce. Plus, you leave every visit with fresh flowers to brighten up your week. Eligibility: We serve our neighbors throughout Chicago whose incomes are below certain guidelines. We do NOT require proof of income but you will sign an official form that states you meet the guidelines.  ", "notes": "Our schedule changed July 2024, our hours of distribution are Mondays, Wednesdays, Fridays and Saturdays from 11am-3pm and Thursdays 4pm - 7pm.   PLEASE NOTE: Nourishing Hope's Sheridan Market and El Mercadito locations may close early if we reach our service capacity for the day.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "773-525-1777", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 1, "regionName": "Greater Chicago Food Depository", "logoBlobNameSmall": "91461b0b-88b1-4d61-98fc-b15c4eecb6d2.png", "website": "www.chicagosfoodbank.org"}, {"regionId": 5, "regionName": "Open Shelf - Austin", "logoBlobNameSmall": "c6d86dea-c84b-4357-9221-a2b5eee407a1.png", "website": "openshelfnow.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 11:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Wednesday 11:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Thursday 12:30 PM-2:30 PM", "Thursday 4:00 PM-7:00 PM", "Friday 11:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Saturday 11:00 AM-3:00 PM"], "services": [{"name": "Pantry/Grocery Distribution", "category": "Food Program", "overview": "When you come to the Sheridan Market, you\u2019ll receive safely packed, pre-packaged groceries, making sure you get what you need and want. Our offerings include: Healthy dairy products, including milk and cheese; A wide variety of meats; High-quality fresh vegetables from our partners; Personal hygiene products; and flowers at the end of every visit. We can\u2019t wait for you to visit us!", "qualifications": "Our Sheridan Market serves anyone who lives in the city of Chicago \u2014 there are currently no service area boundaries for this program. We do NOT require proof of income but you will be required to attest that you meet the official guidelines. Please visit https://www.nourishinghopechi.org/get-food/ for more information.", "contact": "Angela Cimarusti Clifford (773-525-1777)"}, {"name": "The Online Market", "category": "Food Program", "overview": "Our new Online Market is a free service that fits your schedule! Order on your own time from any computer or smartphone. Find what you need to create healthy, delicious meals. Pick up from our warehouse, The Hub, or our Sheridan Market. Frozen meats, canned goods, cereal, milk, eggs, and fresh produce are available. Substitutions where available \u2013 get the food you want! No need to wait in line! Continued access to our physical food pantry locations. The Online Market is a monthly order. You can still make your weekly pickup at our other locations. Special thanks to the Thierer Family Foundation for making this program possible!", "qualifications": "

Participants must live in the city of Chicago.

To sign up please visit https://www.nourishinghopechi.org/get-food/onlinemarket/

", "contact": "Online Market (773-525-1777)"}], "specialHours": [{"locationSpecialHoursId": 8112, "locationId": 672, "specialDate": "2025-08-30T00:00:00", "startTime": null, "endTime": null, "startTimeDescr": null, "endTimeDescr": null, "closedInd": true, "notes": "Labor Day", "addDateTime": "2025-02-25T18:44:01.287", "addUserName": "carrie.mccormack@nourishinghopechi.org", "updateDateTime": null, "updateUserName": null}, {"locationSpecialHoursId": 8113, "locationId": 672, "specialDate": "2025-09-01T00:00:00", "startTime": null, "endTime": null, "startTimeDescr": null, "endTimeDescr": null, "closedInd": true, "notes": "Labor Day", "addDateTime": "2025-02-25T18:44:01.31", "addUserName": "carrie.mccormack@nourishinghopechi.org", "updateDateTime": null, "updateUserName": null}]}
